results.title: Overview of the SharePoint Framework (SPFx)
results.description: Overview of the SharePoint Framework The SharePoint Framework (SPFx) is a page and web part model that provides full support for client-side SharePoint development, easy integration with SharePoint data, and ext... Industry standard tooling – SharePoint Framework is using standard web stack tooling with node, npm, TypeScript and any JavaScript.

results.title: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part (Hello World part 1)
results.description: Use your favorite code editor Because the SharePoint client-side solution is HTML/TypeScript based, you can use any code editor that supports client-side development to build your web part, such as: Visual Studio Code Webstorm The SharePoint Framework documentation uses Visual Studio Code in the steps and examples.
